attributes.action: highlight the issue of 'irresponsible media activity' and to consider strict guildines.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the newspapers / magazines / TV stations should have clear guidelines in relation to potentially irresponsible stories.  The speculative journalism of many writers often causes a great deal of pain to people.  Where is the consideration for those that are grieving a death?  For example - It is not essential to see a body-bag being removed from a building.
